title: Pogačar Is Human, Evenepoel Is Rampant: Did the Vibes Shift for the Tour de France?
content:
A shock upset for Pogačar at Amstel and a golden Easter resurrection by Evenepoel throw kinks into the narratives of their 'Big 4' brawl this summer with Vingegaard, Roglič.

Read the full article at Pogačar Is Human, Evenepoel Is Rampant: Did the Vibes Shift for the Tour de France? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
